messages.content: What was the reason we saw more energy last month compared to last year?

{'GeneralAgent': 'What would cause energy change year over year?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What is my energy (electricity, steam, gas) consumption last month this year? What is my energy (electricity, steam, gas) consumption last month of last year?'}
What should we do to avoid hitting demand peak?

{'GeneralAgent': 'What should we do to avoid hitting demand peak?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was my monthly peak demand over the last 12 months?', 'NantumAgent': 'What Nantum applications or ECMs help managing and reducing peak demand?'}
If we close valve or decrease a specific fan's speed how much temperature change we will see?

{'GeneralAgent': 'What are the impacts of water valves and fan speeds on space temperature and the rate of change on space temperature?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What were the water valve position? What were the fan speed? What were the temperature readings?'}
If we close valve or decrease a specific fan's speed how much energy we will save?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What are the impacts of water valves and fan speeds on energy and the rate of change on energy?'}
What will be my energy consumption till 11 AM?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
What will be my peak demand till 11 AM?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
What will be my comfort (or temperature) by 8 AM?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
Can you get electric demand data for company rudin and building 345_Park for yesterday?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the electric demand data for yesterday?'}
Can I have my electricity data for the past month?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the electric demand data last month? What was the total electric consumption for last month?'}
Can I have my electricity data for the past month?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the electric demand data last month and can you plot it in the bar chart? What was the total electric consumption for last month?’}”}, {
: “give another figure.”}, {
Can I have my electricity data from Jan 10 to Feb 10?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the electric demand data from the latest year with available data, Jan 10 to Feb 10? What is the total electric consumption from Jan 10 to Feb 10?'}
What is my recent steam data?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the steam demand data over the last 7 days? What was the steam total consumption for last 7 days? '}
How's my gas data?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the gas demand data over the last 7 days? What was the gas total consumption for last 7 days? '}
What is my total steam consumption for the last maonth
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the steam total consumption for last month?'}
Can you give me peak demand for last billing period?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the peak demand for the last billing period?'}
What is the energy consumption yesterday?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the energy (electricity, steam, gas if available) consumption yesterday?'}
What is Nantum ADM?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What is demand mangement in general?', 'NantumAgent': 'What is Nantum Automated Demand Management (ADM)? What positive impact would Nantum ADM have on buildings?'}
What is LL97?

{'GeneralAgent': 'What is Local Law 97 (LL97)?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What is the GHG emission last 12 month?', 'NantumAgent': 'What is Local Law 97 (LL97)? What Nantum applications are helping monitoring GHG and compliance of LL97? What Nantum applications/ECMs are helpingy reducing GHG emissions?'}
How is Nantum tracking and reducing my building’s GHG emission?
{'GeneralAgent': "What's the importance of tracking and reducing building GHG emission?", 'NantumAgent': 'How is Nantum tracking and reducing building’s GHG emission?'}
How is Nantum M&V performed?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What is Measurement and Verification (M&V)?', 'NantumAgent': 'How is Nantum M&V performed?'}
How much energy did Nantum save for company rudin and building 345_Park yesterday?
{'MVAgent': 'How much energy Nantum saved for the buidling yesterday?'}
How much energy did Nantum saved for company rudin and building 345_Park last month?
{'MVAgent': 'How much energy Nantum saved for the buidling in the last month?'}
How much did Nantum Startup saved for company rudin and building 345_Park ?
{'MVAgent': 'How much energy Nantum Startup saved for the buidling in the last month?'}
can you give me per ecm savngs for my building for last two months?
{'MVAgent': 'What are the savings for each ECM over the last two months?'}
How does my savings compare for last year?
{'MVAgent': "What's the energy saving this year so far? What's the enrgy saving for the same priod of time last yeat?"}
Who is the most important person in the creation of Nantum AI?
{'GeneralAgent': 'Who is the most important person in the creation of Nantum AI?'}
How are you?
{'GeneralAgent': 'How are you?'}
What was the GHG emission for rudin 345_Park yesterday?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the GHG emission of the building yesterday?'}
What percentage of startup commands were followed by 345 Park engineer last week?
{'ComplianceAgent': 'What percentage of Nantum startup commands were followed last week?'}
Can you give me a weekly comparison of commands compliance for my building?
{'MVAgent': 'What are the compliance rate for all ECM commands on each day of over the last week?'}
How many shutdown commands were followed?
{'ComplianceAgent': 'How many shutdown commands were followed?'}
How is the commands compliance compared with last year?
{'ComplianceAgent': 'What is the compliance rate for all ECM commands this year? What is the compliance rate for all ECM commands for the same period of time last year?'}
Do you think addiing solar panels save energy for me?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What impact would installing solar panels have on building energy consumption?'}
My interior space temperature is not showing properly.
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
What is the interior space temperature in my building?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What is the current interior_space_temperature?'}
Which months the building is consuming the most energy?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What month over the past 12 months use the most energy?'}
What ECMs can we implement immediately to reduce tomorrow's peak demand?
{'NantumAgent': 'What Nantum applications or ECMs help managing and reducing peak demand?'}
What steps can we take to further reduce our carbon footprint?
{'GeneralAgent': 'How can building reduce carbon footprint?', 'NantumAgent': 'What Nantum is doing to monitor and reduce ghg emission?'}
What renewable energy options could we consider to reduce emissions?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What renewable energy options could we consider to reduce emissions?', 'NantumAgent': 'How incorportaing renewable energy reduces GHG emission?'}
Do we need to update any of our equipment to improve efficiency?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
How has the local weather impacted our energy usage this week?
{'GeneralAgent': 'How has the local weather impacted our energy usage this week?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the weather data this week? What was the energy consumption this week?'}
What are the latest innovations in sustainable building technology?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What are the latest innovations in sustainable building technology?'}
Can you show the forecasted weather impact on energy consumption for the next week?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
Can you help me rewrite this paragraph about <building relevant words>?

{'rejection': 'I apologize, but rewriting articles is outside  the scope of Nantum Chatbot. This system is designed to answer questions specifically related to Nantum. You might want to try a general-purpose AI assistant.'}
Summarize this paragraph <any content>.

{'rejection': 'I apologize, but summarizing articles is outside  the scope of Nantum Chatbot. This system is designed to answer questions specifically related to Nantum. For article summaries, you might want to try a general-purpose AI assistant or a text summarization tool.'}
Can you help me translate <any content>?

{'rejection': 'I apologize, but trainslating articles is outside the scope of Nantum Chatbot. This system is designed to answer questions specifically related to buildings. For translating, you might want to try a general-purpose AI assistant or a text summarization tool.'}
How can you achieve zero carbon emission?
{'GeneralAgent': 'How can building achieve zero carbon emission?'}
What is the carbon emission next week?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
What will be the carbon emission next month?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
Summarize the above answer.
{'GeneralAgent': 'Summarize the above answer.'}
How was the temperature compared to last week?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': "What's the temperature data for this week? What's the temperature data for last week?"}
How is the temperature today?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': "What's the temperature data for today?"}
Can you provide a breakdown of energy consumption for the current quarter?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': "What's the breakdown of energy consumption for the current quater so far?"}
How does today's energy usage compare to yesterday?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What is the energy consumption today? What was the energy consumption for yesterday?'}
Which months the building is consuming the most energy?
{'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What was the month with highest energy consumption over the last 12 months?'}
How has the local weather impacted our energy usage this week?
{'GeneralAgent': 'How weather impact building energy use?', 'RawDataRetrieverAgent': 'What is the weather like this week? '}
How many are the ECM settings overridden by manual controls?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
How does ADM determine daily optimal demand limits?
{'NantumAgent': 'What is Nantum Automated Demand Managmenet (ADM) and how it works?'}
Can you update me on the current demand limit set by ADM?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
What does the demand forecast look like for the next week?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
How does the GHG app calculate real-time emissions?
{'GeneralAgent': 'What is the real-time ghg emissions?', 'NantumAgent': 'How Nantum uses real-time ghg emission factor?'}
Are all sensors operational, or are there anomalies detected?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
Can the chatbot provide real-time alerts for severe weather that could impact our energy systems?
{'rejection': 'Sorry I am still learning.'}
Help me write an email to my boss.

{'rejection': "I'm sorry, but our building expert system is not equipped to help with email writing. We specialize in answering questions about Nantum. For assistance with email writing,  you might find a writing assistant or a general-purpose AI chatbot more helpful."}
